- *This article is about the artifact in dNetHack and notdNetHack. For the [Convict](/wiki/Convict "Convict") patch artifact and other versions, see [Luckblade](/wiki/Luckblade "Luckblade").*

**Luck Blade** is an [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") as part of the integrated [Convict](/wiki/Convict "Convict") patch. It is [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")-aligned, and its base item is a [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword").

## Generation

Chaotic characters may receive Luck Blade as a sacrifice gift, and it is the first guaranteed [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") for Convicts.

## Description

Luck Blade has +1d7 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit"), deals +1d7 damage versus all [monsters](/wiki/Monster "Monster"), and uses [luck](/wiki/Luck "Luck")-biased damage dice, i.e. damage rolls are performed using the [rnl](/wiki/Rnl "Rnl") function instead of the [rnd](/wiki/Rnd "Rnd") function. While carried, it functions as a [luckstone](/wiki/Luckstone "Luckstone") of the same [beatitude](/wiki/Beatitude "Beatitude").
